title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 13.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 13.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part: (a) Mass merchandising plan means a method of selling personal property-liability insurance wherein: (1)
such insurance is offered to employees of particular employers or to members of particular associations or organizations; and
(2)
the employer, association or organization has agreed to, or otherwise affiliated itself with, the sale of such insurance to its employees or members. (b) Personal property-liability insurance means insurance to which section
3425
of the Insurance Law applies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
13.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
